blueprint.description:
Station to send materials to a distant construction site.

Put the items required (plus a check-mark) into OFF constant combinators and connect via red wire to the pole.  Green on pole indicates how many still need to be sent.

When ready, turn it ON.

Mu[tiple combinators may be chained if one isn't enough or you want to stage the delivery.  I like to send power, roboports, and robots first.  Turn on additional ones as desired.  Only the first needs a check-mark.

Turn OFF when all done.
blueprint.label: Construction Supply
